price: 104. En verdad, Al-lah no guiará a quienes no crean en Sus aleyas, y estos tendrán un castigo doloroso (en la otra vida).
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ لَا يَهۡدِيهِمُ ٱللَّهُ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna lā yu'minūna biāyāti al-lahi lā yahdīhimu al-lahu walahum ʿadhābun alīmun
